sqlMap.sql: select a.userCode,a.uintCode,b.projectID, b.name as projectName,b.projectType,b.totalPoeples from projectInfo b join projectOwner a on a.projectID=b.projectID [companyType | join CompanyInfo c on b.companyId=c.companyId] where 1=1 {projectOwner:a,projectInfo:b} [projectType:pt| and b.projectType=:pt] [:companyType,:companyName | and c.companyType=:companyType and c.companyName like :companyName] order by b.name
